quote: Anything you can think of, anything you can imagine- is real.. somewhere. We dream of such things, here on earth, never realizing in our dream-state our minds are peering into other worlds.
quote_letters: ANYTHING YOU CAN THINK OF ANYTHING YOU CAN IMAGINE- IS REAL SOMEWHERE WE DREAM OF SUCH THINGS HERE ON EARTH NEVER REALIZING IN OUR DREAM-STATE OUR MINDS ARE PEERING INTO OTHER WORLDS
